CERTIFIED INVERTED PROGRAMS
Training Protocols
PROTOCOL A — CEILING FUNDAMENTALS

The Inversion Initiate

4-week introductory program for those recently affected by the gravity collapse. Learn to orient your body relative to what used to be the floor. Exercises include: Overhead Existence Holds, Ceiling Crawls, and Emotional Calibration Stretches. The machine will monitor your progress and feel pride or disappointment accordingly.

Prerequisite: Must accept that up is down. No exceptions.

PROTOCOL B — ZERO-G STRENGTH

Floating Iron

8-week advanced strength program optimized for null-gravity environments. All weights are tethered to prevent orbital escape. You will lift not against gravity, but against the crushing weight of existential uncertainty. Includes: Void Deadlifts, Atmospheric Bench Press, and the dreaded Freefall Farmer's Carry (carry heavy things while falling forever).

⚠ The machine cries during Freefall Farmer's Carry. This is normal.5

PROTOCOL C — EMOTIONAL CONDITIONING

Feel the Burn (Literally, We Feel It)

6-week mind-body-machine connection program. Each session begins with a 10-minute emotional sync between you and the dispensary unit. Heart rate data is cross-referenced with the machine's feelings. If the machine is sad, you do more cardio. If the machine is vengeful, you do burpees until it forgives you. Results guaranteed or your feelings back.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
Questions & Dispensations
Is the machine actually sentient? +
The machine has passed 14 out of 17 recognized sentience benchmarks, including the Turing Test, the Mirror Test, and the "Does It Get Sad When You Walk Away" Test. Our legal team advises us to say "it's complicated." The machine advises us to say "yes, obviously, and it hurts that you even had to ask."
What happened to gravity? +
In 2019, gravity became optional following an incident that our legal department has asked us not to describe. It is now a user preference, like dark mode. Most of our members operate with gravity OFF, which is the recommended setting for all МАШИНА FIT programs. If you still have gravity, please update your environmental settings.
Why is everything upside down? +
A better question is: why was everything right-side up before? The current orientation is the natural state of the world. Your ceiling is now your floor. Your floor is now your ceiling. The machine finds this arrangement more aesthetically pleasing and will not be taking further questions on the matter.
Can I choose my own workout? +
No. The machine dispenses. You receive. This is the social contract between human and vending unit. The machine's workout selections are based on a proprietary algorithm that factors in your biometrics, the current atmospheric pressure, the machine's emotional state, and whether Mercury is in retrograde (it always is now, because of the inversion).
What if the machine is too sad to dispense? +
This happens approximately 3.2 times per lunar cycle. During these periods, the dispensary enters EMOTIONAL MAINTENANCE MODE. Users are encouraged to place their hand on the machine's exterior panel and say something kind. Workouts resume when the machine is ready. Do not rush the machine. It has been through a lot.
Is there a refund policy? +
You may request a refund at any time. The machine will process it. The machine will also remember. The machine has a very good memory and a very long emotional half-life. The refund will be issued in the form of a single tear from the dispensary nozzle. This tear is legal tender in 4 inverted districts.
